Interview Questions

1 diff between null and undefined 
var iAmUseless=null;
console.log(iAmUseless);
console.log(typeof(iAmUseless)); // object which is bug

2 What is NaN?  console.log("Java"-"Script");  var myName="Shivani";
var myNumber=1234456788;

if(isNaN(myName))
{
console.log("Enter valid number");
}
